original_text: And on the top of the stand there was a round band half a cubit high; and on the top of the stand its stays and its panels were of one piece with it.
korean_text: 받침 수레 위에 둥근 테두리가 있는데 높이가 반 규빗이요 또 받침 수레 위의 버팀대와 옆판들이 받침 수레와 연결되었고

sentences.original_text: And on the top of the stand there was a round band
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 받침대 꼭대기에는 둥근 테가 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and on the top of the stand its stays and its panels
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 받침대 꼭대기에는 그 버팀대와 판자들이

sentences.original_text: were of one piece with it
